impact-statement: The formation of mutually exclusive coding and non-coding transcription units contributes to transcriptional interference and insulation at gene clusters and manages state-switching in response to environmental change.

competing-interest.conf2: The other authors declare that no competing interests exist.
competing-interest.conf1: JM: Adviser to Oxford Biodynamics Ltd and Sibelius Ltd and sits on the board of Chronos Therapeutics. OBD provided funding for this work but like all the funders, had no say in the design or outcome of the research and do not benefit in any way from this research.
